subject: Mental Health
title: Trauma-Informed Care
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Trauma-Informed Care.

hook.text: Instead of asking what's wrong with you, trauma-informed care asks what happened to you.

buildup.text: This approach assumes many patients have a trauma history, even if unspoken.

discovery.text: It shifts the focus from symptoms to the experiences that created them.

twist.text: Schools, prisons, and hospitals adopting this model see dramatic outcome improvements.

climax.text: Trauma-informed systems reduce retraumatization and build trust with survivors.

punchline.text: The question changes everything about the answer.

quiz.question: What question does trauma-informed care prioritize?
